key_dates.description: Second turning point. Aligns with cyclical timing.

seasonal: August generally negative for EUR/USD. Bearish bias. Two strong monthly cycles and two weekly cycles (ending ~Aug 8 and ~Aug 22) support bearish view.

statistics.description: EUR/USD closed lower on Aug 17 vs Aug 5 in ~70% of 20 years.

insights: Bearish month with two monthly and two weekly cycles supporting decline.
Recovery from 50%+ correction over 20 weeks - potential for continuation or reversal.
61.8% Fibonacci retracement not yet broken - significant resistance.
Support at 1.1576-1.1625 holding. Break below = reversal signal.
Weekly uptrend shifting to potential decline phase.
Daily in consolidation. Key levels: resistance 1.1625, support 1.1070-1.1390.
Two strong monthly cycles support decline. Weekly cycles ending Aug 8/22 are key.
Aug 17 vs Aug 5: 70% probability Euro closed lower.

resistance.description: Higher resistance from previous price action.

technical.indicators: Weekly potential for continuation or reversal. 61.8% Fib at 1.1390 critical. Daily in consolidation. Two monthly + two weekly cycles align around Aug 8 and Aug 22-25.

summary: EUR/USD August 2025: bearish seasonality with five turning points (Aug 1, 8, 15, 21, 25). 80% decline probability on Aug 29. 70% down bias Aug 5-17. Support 1.1576-1.1625 critical. 61.8% Fib at 1.1390 major level.
previous_month_review: July: 4 dates. 04.07=near high (-1 day), no sharp decline followed. 11.07=failed, became continuation. 18.07=low (-1 day), quality reversal to 24.07. 30.07=possible low, still in question.
risk_notes: Two monthly + two weekly cycles align for significant moves around Aug 8/22.
Daily cycles Aug 8/25 align with weekly - amplified reversals.
